channel.title: Blog on DL

item.title: Joining Uber
item.description: I have decided to join Uber data science team for the next step in my career. I will be working in Marketing Analytics. I am responsible for analytics support on the Canada Rides business. I will be working very closely with the Canada marketing and operation team. Hiring process I was reached out by a recruiter from the ATG originally on Linkedin for a Data Engineer role. We scheduled a 15 mins phone chat.
